name: Learn To Spearfish – Spearfishing Charter
description:
Always dreamed about spearfishing? Or are you an avid fisherman or a hunter that wants to try something else to get dinner on the table? Playa del Carmen Mexico is the spearfishing location for your spearfishing charter. You snorkel on the surface, hold your breath, dive under the water and shoot the fish you want for dinner. It will be a great adventure and you will love it!

Diego is your spearfishing guide in Playa del Carmen. He is a knowledgable biologist, who speaks Spanish and English. Diego is freediving certified by FII and will teach you with passion the basics of freediving and spearfishing. Of course, Diego will do his very best to get you a fish on a spear. Group rates are available upon request. We accept cancellations up to 48 hours before your scheduled trip for a full refund. Spaces for this spearfishing trip are limited, so reserve your date today!
